name: df-bj-lt
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cltxr, cun(crab(s0, cxp(crrbar, crrbar), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cop(cv(s1), c0r)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cop(cv(s2), c0r))), wbr(cv(s1), cltr, cv(s2)))))), cun(cun(cxp(csn(cminfty), cr), cxp(cr, csn(cpinfty))), cxp(csn(cminfty), csn(cpinfty)))))
comment: Define the standard (strict) order on the extended reals. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Feb-2023.)
